text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to serve at a dinner party?
text.Response A: Sure! When you're at a dinner party, you should say "hello" to everyone and make sure you're sitting in the right place. You should also be ready to eat when it's time to eat. If you need help with anything, just ask the person sitting next to you.
text.Response B: Sure! CSI bingo is a game where you have to find the items in the CSI show on a card.  The items are usually the characters, the crime scene, and the evidence.  You can also find the settings of the show.  The first person to find all the items on their card wins.  You can also play a variation of the game where you have to find the items in the season 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 of the show.  The person who finds all the items in the season 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 of the show wins.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

536.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to serve at a dinner party?

Response A

Sure! When you're at a dinner party, you should say "hello" to everyone and make sure you're sitting in the right place. You should also be ready to eat when it's time to eat. If you need help with anything, just ask the person sitting next to you.

Response B

Sure! CSI bingo is a game where you have to find the items in the CSI show on a card. The items are usually the characters, the crime scene, and the evidence. You can also find the settings of the show. The first person to find all the items on their card wins. You can also play a variation of the game where you have to find the items in the season 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 of the show. The person who finds all the items in the season 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 of the show wins.
